data.title: Great place to meet & have great coffee.
data.text: They have great coffee drinks, and it's a great place to meet friends for a short time.  I've invited out of town friends to meet me here, and it is an inviting atmosphere, good products, and friendly service.

data.title: great local  coffee
data.text: Always a pleasure to go here.  meet neighbors. sit by self. Relax  on a sofa.  work on your computer.  good coffee and nice baristas.

data.title: Coffee time
data.text:
Hey if you want a coffee place that fits the bill this is it . It has the total vibe with old couches and chairs some table and you can stay and get comfy as long as you want . 
I read some of the negative reviews and they are a little exaggerated . 
First this is a coffee shop and that should be your reason for going there , they have fresh bagels from Jazzy Bagel , you can toast it with cream cheese and a good
Cup of coffee your days is going to start off great . 

This place still does coffee the good old fashion way not some sped  up  push button it's hand crafted . And they have many more drink items you don't see at other coffee shop .

data.title: For the younger, goth crowd who thrives on caffine and beng seen.
data.text: Not where you want to go unless you like younger folk trying to look like older folk who like goth! Not for me....

data.title: Community Coffeehouse for Gresham
data.text: This is the place to stop for a quick bite, a snack, lunch or your favorite coffee drink. Great staff. Comfy couches and chairs as well as tables.

data.title: Coffee & dessert with a friend
data.text:
This is a really fun coffee shop in downtown Gresham.A lot of comfortable over stuffed chairs & couches.Tables to play games.Area for Wi-fi.A very relaxing atmosphere to read 
a book or visit with friends.I had a delicious Hazelnut Latte & coffee cake,both delicious.

data.title: Huge Comfortable Space, Great Staff and Great Coffee!
data.text: The staff at Cafe D are extremely friendly. They memorized my drink after only a few visits. They also have a great space to meet others or work alone on your laptop.

data.title: Fun place to hang out, really good coffee!!
data.text: This is a fun place to hang out.  Lots of things to look at on the walls and around the shop.  My wife and I ordered coffees and had a little snack.  Everything was very good.

data.title: Best Blended Mocha Anywhere
data.text: I just go there for one thing; the Blended Mocha. Can't beat it. Not too sugary, quality chocolate, and you can taste the shots of coffee! Absolutely the best.

data.title: Great atmosphere
data.text: They are a full service coffee place at a reasonable price. The best  reason to go here is the atmosphere. They have old couches and some tables. The staff is laid-back and you can stay all day on a cup of coffee!

data.title: Gresham's Foundation
data.text: Delirium is not polished like the chain stores, they are real. This is the kind of place that hosts the table of guys that solve all of the Gresham's and the world's problems, tables of old friends chatting, students studying, Real Estate agents grabbing a bit of wifi with their latte, moms with kids meeting other moms with kids, and guys like me just watching it all happen. They have great treats from local bakeries and very good coffee with the nicest staff around. Enjoy!

data.title: Good atmosphere and coffee drinks
data.text: Cafe D has been an easy stop for me for our business coffee meetings. Great staff and they can make a good cup of coffee. WiFi is available with makes closing the deal much easier.

data.title: Yummy Drinks
data.text: This is an awesome place in downtown Gresham.  Beautiful mix and match seating, fun cards, good food and a great place to meet friends and share a warm drink!

data.title: Wonderful ambiance!
data.text:
Cafe Delirium is one of the most interesting coffee shops we've had the pleasure to visit and, as coffee lovers who need a good cup of java to start the day, we've visited quite a few!

This is an authentic, neighborhood experience - a favorite hangout for locals. And no wonder. The large, comfortable seating area, complete with sofas  and private nooks for intimate conversation, is flanked by windows with plenty of sunlight pouring in (weather permitting).

The decor has a 60's flair: love and peace and good friends enjoying each other's company. It's certainly not a corporate place, lacking in local color, like so many of the national chains. This is a place to relax and contemplate the best of life. Enjoy!

data.title: The Corner Coffee Shop Hang Out
data.text:
This is our always dependable place to go in Gresham for coffee, (other coffee shops come and go, but this place has been there for all of us residents for years now).
We have taken our grandchildren here ever since they could walk for a goodie, they have either a cinnamon roll, scone or cookie, but always with hot chocolate & wiped cream on top.
My friends and I drop in, sometimes we walk there form our house about 1 and 1/2 miles, (add that up 3 miles round trip, wow, ha ha), as well as my husband and I stopping in for coffee together or some oatmeal and coffee if it's early and we have not had our breakfast yet.
The owner is nice as well as the staff and I'm glad they have added to their menu over the years, giving more choices for us to chose from.  
Keep up the good work guys......

data.title: The happening place in Downtown Gresham
data.text:
Atmosphere, Check
Great coffee, Check
Awesome pastries, Check
Interesting and fun people, Check
Location, Check
Cafe Delirium has it all, come and check it out, room for everyone on comfortable homey furniture or sit at a table. Take a seat at the window bar to have a birds eye view of downtown Gresham during farmers market, teddy bear parade, the car show or any of the other fun events in downtown.

data.title: Gresham popular coffee shop right on main downtown
data.text: This a great place to go for coffee and pastries, and enjoy the local scene, meet with friends, or hunker down to work on your phone or computer.  It is large enough, that we always seem to find a seat. They also have a light food menu of breakfast sandwiches, oatmeal (which we have there when we go), soup, sandwiches, and salad.  The cafe is well lighted, cheery, and lively - a happy place in Gresham.

data.title: The Perfect Vibe ☕️
data.text: I do not drink coffee lightly and this shop does not disappoint. It's a favorite when I'm home (I make a point to stop in at least twice). They have anything from a delicious basic latte to their more phroo-phrooy blended drinks. Their customer service and atmosphere is really what makes this place a gem. Don't leave Gresham/Portland area without stopping in for a little (or big) cut of coffee. You won't regret it.

data.title: Great place for coffee and lunch
data.text: I always have well prepared drinks at Delirium. And for the occasional lunch I recommend the grilled sandwiches.

data.title: Cafe D!
data.text: This is THE watering hole on Main street.  You can't find a seat at 10 in the morning.  Everyone come here because Cody is so genuine and his staff really wants to help you.  They make great drinks and even some lite lunch items.  Old retro furniture, tall tables, short tables, quiet room, books, games, atmosphere!
